docs.lead_paragraph: Candidates and outside groups are starting to feel comfortable running ads about the attacks, navigating a delicate line in politicizing a tragedy.
docs.snippet: Candidates and outside groups are starting to feel comfortable running ads about the attacks, navigating a delicate line in politicizing a tragedy....
docs.abstract: Republican presidential campaigns and outside groups have begun running political ads focused on terrorism, Paris attacks and threat by groups like Islamic State; ads both darken Christmas season and walk fine line between highlighting candidates' security credentials and capitalizing on tragedy.

docs.lead_paragraph: An announcement is anticipated on Monday at the global summit meeting on climate in Paris, as Mr. Gates takes a major step to cut global-warming emissions.
docs.snippet: An announcement is anticipated on Monday at the global summit meeting on climate in Paris, as Mr. Gates takes a major step to cut global-warming emissions....
docs.abstract: Bill Gates will announce creation of multibillion-dollar clean energy fund at opening of a Paris summit on global warming; historic fund, which has backing of United States, China, India and other countries, will include contributions from billionaires and philanthropists.

headline.print_headline: Bill Gates Is Expected to Create Energy Fund
headline.main: Bill Gates Expected to Create Billion-Dollar Fund for Clean Energy

docs.lead_paragraph: Seemingly taking a cue from Donald J. Trump, the Republican field is cursing in public at a rate unheard of in modern presidential politics.

byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

docs.snippet: Seemingly taking a cue from Donald J. Trump, the Republican field is cursing in public at a rate unheard of in modern presidential politics....
docs.abstract: Republican presidential field is taking cue from Donald J Trump and cursing in public at unprecedented rate; reasons for shift in decorum seem varied, ranging from attempt to grab attention to providing sign of candidate's vitality or rawness.

docs.lead_paragraph: Bernie Sanders expressed varying levels of support for gay rights as he rose politically, and some gay rights advocates say he was less than a leader.
docs.snippet: Bernie Sanders expressed varying levels of support for gay rights as he rose politically, and some gay rights advocates say he was less than a leader....
docs.abstract: Gay rights activists in Burlington, Vt, say Sen Bernie Sanders was not always supportive of their concerns during his time as mayor there, calling into question his attempts to set himself apart from rival Hillary Clinton on issue; some observers say Sanders's strong focus on economic inequality and efforts to make politically palatable arguments clouded his support for gay rights.

headline.print_headline: Sanders an Uneven Ally in Fight for Gay Rights
headline.main: As Gay Rights Ally, Bernie Sanders Wasn’t Always in Vanguard
